head.title: C# .NET Redaction API | Hide Private Text from PDF Word Excel Images
head.description: Document redaction API for .NET. Redact, hide or remove sensitive content from PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, presentations, & raster images.

header.title: Secure Classified Data via Redaction API
header.description: Redact, hide or remove sensitive content & metadata from documents, worksheets, presentations, PDF and raster image files using .NET API.

tabs.overview: GroupDocs.Redaction for .NET is an API library that helps you erase sensitive and classified data from various file formats, such as, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint and PDF. Our Redaction APIâ€™s single format-independent interface supports redaction of various types, e.g., text redaction, metadata redaction, annotation redaction, and tabular document redaction. GroupDocs.Redaction for .NET API also allows you to redact password protected files. You are allowed to save the document in its original format as well as create a sanitized PDF document with raster images of original pages.

one.description: Following is an overview of GroupDocs.Redaction for {{ProductName}}:

content.title: Redact Text, Metadata & Comments
content.step_1: **Word**: DOC, DOCX, DOT, ODT, DOTX, DOCM, DOTM, RTF
content.step_2: **Excel**: XLS, XLSX, XLT, XLTX, XLSM, XLTM, CSV
content.step_3: **PowerPoint**: PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX, POTX, PPTM, PPSM, POTM
content.step_5: **Raster Images**: JPG, BMP, PNG, GIF, TIFF

three.description: GroupDocs.Redaction for {{ProductName}} supports following Operating Systems, Frameworks & Package Managers:

row1.title: Operating Systems
row1.data:
* Windows Desktop
                * Windows Server
                * Windows Azure
                * Linux

row2.title: Development Environments
row2.data:
* Microsoft Visual Studio
                * Xamarin.Android
                * Xamarin.IOS
                * Xamarin.Mac
                * MonoDevelop

features.title: GroupDocs.Redaction for {{ProductName}} Features
features.feature1: Perform case-sensitive search for exact phrase redaction
features.feature2: Use color box to hide redacted text instead of string replacement
features.feature3: Locate & redact out any text using regular expression search
features.feature4: Filter all or any combination of classified metadata information of document
features.feature5: Quickly erase complete metadata information of specific document
features.feature6: Set a scope of the redaction to a specific worksheet and/or column in Excel
features.feature7: Remove all or specific comments and other annotations from the document
features.feature8: Search & remove sensitive data from the annotation text
features.feature9: Ability to work with your own formats & redactions
features.feature10: Support for raster image formats and image region redactions
features.feature11: Specify a set of redaction rules (policy) in XML file
features.feature12: Specify Pages Range and PDF Compliance Level while Conversion to PDF
features.feature13: Edit or Delete EXIF Metadata from Image Files
features.feature14: Redact Embedded Images inside the PDF, Word & Presentation Documents
features.feature15: Save a Redaction Policy as an XML File

more_features.title: Redact your Classified Data with Ease & Control
more_features.content: {{ProductFullName}} API grants you complete control over how you want to hide or erase your important classified information from supported document. To use our Redaction API is pretty simple and straight forward.

example.description: In following example, we load a supported document, redact out any text, matching "2 digits, space or nothing, 2 digits, again space and 6 digits" (such as 12 34 567890) with a blue color box using {{ProgLang}}. Once that is done, it saves the document in its original format by renaming it with an added suffix "_Redacted":
example.comment_init: Create an instance of Redactor class

solutions: GroupDocs.Redaction offers document viewing APIs for other popular development environments
